content.description: python version of higher order function (2017 Fall, Final, Question 12 b)

p.line: What does _BOLDS_[x*10 for x in range(3) if x != 1]_BOLDE_ evaluate to? (select ONE)

content.hint: please try it out using python interpreter, following the order that the line is executed. e.g. for "my_list[0]", figure out what "my_list" contains first; for [x for x in a if f(x)], figure out what [x for x in a] will return first.
